textBeforeTable: Payment details We offer a no hassle return policy. We ask that the item be returned in its original packaging. We charge a 15% restocking fee for all items. This fee is waived if we determine the item is defective or we made a shipping mistake. Returns will be processed as either a merchandise credit or refund (buyer’s choice) less any applicable restocking fee and original shipping cost. All returns must be coordinated to ensure buyer has the correct return address and RMA #. Return policy details The buyer is responsible for return shipping costs. Money back or replacement (buyer's choice) 14 days after the buyer receives it Refund will be given as Item must be returned within Return policy
